name: 维克多·奥斯特洛夫斯基
name_full: 维克多·奥斯特洛夫斯基 Victor Ostrovsky
introduction: Victor Ostrovsky is the founder of TheBookPatch.com and handles the ISBN releases for the titles himself via his gallery, he's known for Black Ghosts, The Other Side Of Deception, and some others. He heard the frustrations of the authors who were tired of Lulu and CreateSpace lying to them and being an author he developed a project from the authors view.
